onset.Description: Time of the stimulus onset in seconds relative to the beginning of the experiment t=0.

duration.Description: Duration of the stimulus presentation in seconds.

trial_type.Description: The condition of the stimulus being presented in a given block

Levels.Faces: Videos of faces of children making different expressions.
Levels.Bodies: Videos of the bodies of children as they move.
Levels.Scenes: Videos of scenes with movement from panning or motion in the scene.
